runner module¶

UI Module for Lab Menus

This module defines a user interface for various lab menus using the MenuFacade. It includes menus for a calculator, ASCII art generator, own ASCII art generator, figures, user details, and diagrams.

Example

To run the module and start the menu facade, execute the script as follows:

$ python module_name.py

Classes:

  • CalculatorMenu: Menu for a calculator.

  • AsciiArtGeneratorMenu: Menu for an ASCII art generator.

  • OwnAsciiArtGeneratorMenu: Menu for a custom ASCII art generator.

  • FigureMenu: Menu for working with geometric figures.

  • UserMenu: Menu for user details.

  • DiagramMenu: Menu for diagrams.

Functions:

None

If __name__ == ‘__main__’:

Creates a MenuFacade instance with a list of menu tuples and starts the menu.

Author:

Vitalii Fedyk
